actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 93-428.

actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of June 14, 1926 (43 U.S.C. 869), pertaining to the sale of public lands to States and their political subdivisions.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Eliminates the acreage limitations concerning the disposal of lands for public or recreational purposes. Provides that leases of such lands for recreational purposes shall be made without monetary consideration.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of June 14, 1926 (43 U.S.C. 869), pertaining to the sale of public lands to States and their political subdivisions.
